website_summaries.verdict: The OCZ Vector 180 is a good, affordable solid-state drive backed up by a lengthy, user-friendly warranty.
pros: The OCZ Vector 180 protects data in case of power loss and includes hassle-free consumer support as well as a long warranty
cons: The drive's speed and durability rating trail behind high-end SSDs on the market
There are no data security or performance enhancement features

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid Product is Fantastic Speed
customer_reviews.text: The performance of these these drives are maxing out the network speed. Bought these for work in our desktops and laptops. The external construction is rock solid, I highly doubt they would break if you dropped one. Unless OCZ screws up, I will continue to buy these. Marking them with a 5 year warranty just speaks that they trust them. These drives are the slim ones so they fit in the current laptops now. AS Benchmark Test in a nutshell: Read: 476 MB/s Write: 454 MB/s Acc Time Read: 0.065ms Acc Time Write: 0.050ms Score: 1089 Posted the results.
customer_reviews.author: KKG IT

customer_reviews.title: So far this has been great as far as not crashing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after replacing the hard drive two other times on my lap top. So far this has been great as far as not crashing. I had it installed by a reputable company. There are some changes with my lap top since having this hard drive installed such as it is no longer touch screen and tends to be a little slower. I am not sure if it is just the settings on the computer that have been changed or the hard drive that changed it. I know that sounds silly but the computer at least works now and doesn't crash constantly! So I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2016, died in 2020.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it lasted almost 4 years, then went completely dead. Doesn't even show in disk manager. But, it was still under warranty, and Kioxia America, Inc. honored the warranty with no hassles, they even sent a pickup label. It was a quick turnaround, and they sent a brand new replacement. Stellar customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Zombie Guy

customer_reviews.title: A good drive, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: When I initially received the OCZ 180 drive it was acting flaky. So I was disappointed because I've owned a OCZ drive for over 3 years, and it has been very dependable. I actually had initiated a return process after 3 weeks of my PC trying to repair the SSD every other time I would boot up. After checking the drive for failures and errors, it appeared the drive was it good working order. Hmmmm, now what Batman? Turns out that my mbr was corrupt. So after I fixed the mbr from the command line, no more problems with the OCZ 180 SSD after 4 months of!
customer_reviews.author: Will Irvin

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup and good solid drive
customer_reviews.text: solid drive, I am very happy with the performance and the warranty behind it. I was hoping for a Samsung Pro but I saved almost $100 by picking this drive and I have no regrets. The installation was easy, documentations are good - nothing bad to say
customer_reviews.author: JoBee

customer_reviews.text: Rock solid performance compared to may other ssds. Great warranty that I will probably never need to use.

customer_reviews.title: The drive works fine, cloning software
customer_reviews.text: The drive works fine, cloning software.......not so much. I had to use open source programs to clone and resize partitions. Drive performs up to spec and improved laptop boot time and program load as expected, good product.... so far. I have only had the drive installed for a couple of weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Really good! It took about 10 days to my address(in China), it's really fast. 64$ for 120G is cost-efficient, becaus in China you should pay for about 110$ for 120G for the same model. It's a pity that I missed the Black Friday. After being acquired by Toshiba, OCZ performed better and better, and this product works well in my computer. I will buy it again if I have need.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Replaced my OCZ Vertex 2
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Replaced my OCZ Vertex 2, which still works great, just needed more space. Data migration software was easy to use as well.

customer_reviews.title: Another great OCZ/Toshiba product!
customer_reviews.text: Another great product by OCZ/Toshiba. It comes with a nice 2.5" to 3.5" rack/adapter too. You will have to download the newest version of Acronis to do the HDD transfer/clone, but that is not a problem; the Acronis version in the box was an old 2014 version, but the license worked with the download just fine. I have purchased more than a dozen of the OCZ family of SSDs and all have been stellar performers and highly reliable in demanding environments.
customer_reviews.author: RCAT

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Went in without a hitch and doubled my drive space.

customer_reviews.title: Great drive. Extremely poor support. Samsung here I come!
customer_reviews.text: The cloning software is not working with my Toshiba laptop. Tried to do the install several times. I'm sure it's me but try getting help online. No response. Emailed them a couple days ago, they acknowledged my request for help but then nothing. Probably going to return and order a Samsung SSD. I should be rating them 5 stars. It's frustrating because I installed the same drive in my wife's laptop with no problems. Installed easy & works great. Not with my laptop though.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome, Windows 10 now boots in about 15 seconds
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, Windows 10 now boots in about 15 seconds. It also comes with screws and a 3.5" adapter for desktops!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Died in 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SSD drive as an replacement to my drive. I have installed Windows 10 for few weeks and then switch to linux. After using linux for few months, I tried to do a dual boot with windows 10 and linux. When I tried to install windows 10, I couldn't find the drive anymore. I tried in couple of other systems and the drive is not recognized. I purchased a USB to SATA cable and tried it that way, The drive is completely dead. Very disappointed. Now I am using my old Intel SSD drive.
customer_reviews.author: Srikanth Ponnapalli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed for about 6 months now. Laptop is way faster!

customer_reviews.text: Great SSD, used it for my OS partition and it's still going after 2 years

product_meta.title: Toshiba OCZ Vector 180 960GB 2.5" 7mm SATA III Internal Solid State Drive VTR180-25SAT3-960G
product_meta.description: Capacity:960GBDeveloped by the most awarded SSD brand of all time, OCZ Vector 180 SSDs offer the be-all and end-all of feature-sets for the most demanding users who won't settle for anything but the best. Featuring enhanced performance, reliability, and endurance, the Vector 180 series provides a flash storage solution second to none. It's everything you know about SSDs, but better. Vector 180 was designed to redefine best-in-class storage and built to excel in high-end computing environments. Only the fastest boot ups, file transfers, and system responsiveness are acceptable for Vector 180 users. Say goodbye to every form of storage lag and get a computing experience worthy of your time. With superior reliability in mind, Vector 180 SSDs feature Power Failure Management (PFM) to protect the drive in the event of system power loss, ensuring you're up and running again in no time. Vector 180 offers real world performance that you won't get with any other solution. No fancy behind-the-scenes tricks, just pure storage performance. With Toshiba technology built into every drive, each Vector 180 SSD is engineered for superior quality as well as durability with its premium alloy housing.
feature_bullets: Proprietary OCZ Barefoot 3 controller technology combined with the latest Toshiba A19nm flash
Power Failure Management (PFM) helps prevent 'brick drive syndrome' that can occur during sudden power losses
Advanced firmware suite of NAND flash management keeps your drive at higher sustained performance over the long term comparing to competing solutions
Excellent endurance rating at 50GB/ day of host writes for 5 years perfect for power user applications and workloads
Excels in both incompressible and compressible data types such as multimedia, encrypted data, .ZIP files and software
Bundled with a 3.5-inch desktop adapter and Acronis True Image cloning software to easily transfer data from your old hard drive or SSD
Sleek housing offers slimmer 7mm z-height for compatibility with the ultra-thin notebooks
OCZ Shield Plus Warranty- an elite worry-free customer service experience, which eliminates all the hassle surrounding traditional support and warranty claims consumers often have to deal with

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
